n = int(input())
#a = [int(c) for c in input().split()]
count = 0

while n > 0:
    if n & 1 == 1:
        count += 1
    n = n >> 1
print(count)

n = int(input())
s = bin(n)
ans=0
n = len(s)
for i in range(n-1,1,-1):
    if s[i] == '1':
        ans+=1
print(ans)

a = int(input())
ans = 0
while(a != 0):
	j = 0
	while(a % 2 == 0):
		j = 1
		a //= 2
	if (j == 0):
		ans += 1
		a -= 1
print(ans)

a=int(input())
ans=0
while a != 0:
    c=a%2
    ans=ans+c
    a=a//2
print(ans)

n = int(input())
col = 0
while n > 0:
    q = 0
    while 2 ** (q + 1) <= n:
        q += 1
    n -= 2 ** q
    col += 1
print(col)
